problem.title: We understand the challenges of the healthcare industry
problem.description: We understand the daily challenges you face as a healthcare professional. Our platform provides concrete solutions to overcome these obstacles.

problem1.title: Lack of flexibility
problem1.description: Traditional healthcare roles often have rigid schedules that don't accommodate personal and family commitments

problem2.title: Limited access to opportunities
problem2.description: Finding the right opportunities can be challenging as you are not visible to potential employers

problem3.title: Complex administrative tasks
problem3.description: Hiring processes are slow and time-consuming. Administrative tasks can be frustrating

step1.title: Create your personal profile
step1.description: Build your professional profile with your qualifications, experience, and preferences

step2.title: Set your availability, we take care of the rest
step2.description: Indicate when you're available to work, we provide you with the right matches

step3.title: Review your proposed schedule, you're set
step3.description: Validate the match and get the final go-ahead from the hiring team

step4.title: Browse opportunities on the marketplace
step4.description: Alternatively, you can explore open positions directly on the marketplace and get in direct contact when you find the right fit

step5.title: Work and get paid, nothing more, nothing less
step5.description: Provide your services and do what you do best, help patients. We take care of the rest

benefits.title: Benefits for healthcare professionals
benefits.subtitle: Interimed has been designed specifically to address the unique challenges of the Swiss healthcare market:

benefit1.title: Centralise your profile
benefit1.description: Create and manage a professional profile with everything centralized. We send your information directly to the recruiters

benefit2.title: Stay in control of your schedule
benefit2.description: Match your schedule to your needs and preferences, not the other way around

benefit3.title: Automatic matching
benefit3.description: Receive automatic job matches with push notifications. No more searching, no more applying, no more waiting

benefit4.title: All opportunities in one place
benefit4.description: Browse the job marketplace with advanced search filtering to explore opportunities in your area

benefit5.title: Centered administration
benefit5.description: Organize all your documents, contracts and payroll information in one place so you can access them anytime, anywhere
